name: avitannebaum.com
description: A full stack portfolio project for alex (avi) tannenbaum

scripts.clean_builds: rm -r dist && cd client && rm -r build
scripts.build: npm run server_build & npm run client_build
scripts.create_deployment_dir: mkdir <avitannenbaum.com> && cd ./<avitannenbaum.com>&& mkdir client dist && cd ..
scripts.set_deployment: npm run build && npm run create_deployment_dir && npm run copy_client_build & npm run copy_server_build & npm run copy_root
scripts.zip: npm run set_deployment && jar -cMf <avitannenbaum.com.zip> <avitannenbaum.com> && npm run clean_builds

author: Alexander (Avi) Tannenbaum
